doc.field: Tuli Kupferberg and Sylvia Topp Papers
Tuli Kupferberg and Sylvia Topp Papers
Series IX. Performance Props and Costumes
Series IX. Performance Props and Costumes

This series contains clothing, musical instruments, and toys used by Kupferberg in his performances with his band the Fugs, his performing group Revolting Theater, Revolting News television episodes, and solo performances. Army uniforms and helmets; flags; hats; small musical instruments; masks; novelty toys; toy soldiers; t-shirts with slogans; and toy weapons in this series date from the 1960s to 2010. Two of Kupferberg's handmade "erectorines" (a broomstick with hundreds of bottle caps nailed onto it), as well as a black suitcase he used to transport props to performances can also be found in this series.

Items found too badly damaged or stained were deaccessioned by the processing archivist. Deaccessioned material includes bug-infested clothing, heavily stained t-shirts, rusted metal, melted candy, and broken, sharp objects.
